>
[Very, Very Sneaky](/Feats.aspx?ID=51) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 49 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Very Sneaky](/Feats.aspx?ID=46)

</column>

---

You can move up to your Speed when you use the [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) action, and you no longer need to have cover or greater cover or be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or Sneak.
